title: The Lost Key - A Detective's Dilemma
author: Alan Roman
content_markdown: # The Lost Key ## A Detective's Dilemma. Rain lashed against the windows of Blackwood Manor. Detective Harding surveyed the scene, a frown etched on his face. The key, he muttered, it's vanished without a trace.  Mrs. Blackwood wrung her hands. “My grandmother’s antique music box… it's irreplaceable!” Harding examined the ornate lock, a glint of determination in his eyes. We'll find it, he declared.
